top.title: Children among 25 killed in one of Russia's deadliest strikes on western Ukraine

top.title: I won't be silenced, says French anti-drugs activist after murders of two brothers
top.summary: Drugs gangs have a grip on Marseille, but Amine Kessaci says he has "no choice but to fight" after the violent deaths of his brothers.

top.title: All 267 passengers and crew rescued after South Korean ferry runs aground
top.summary: The vessel remains stuck on a reef and unable to move, but there is no risk of sinking, the Coast Guard said.
